Quote.Author: Dag Hammarskjold
Quote.Message: 'Freedom from fear' could be said to sum up the whole philosophy of human rights.

Quote.Author: Dag Hammarskjold
Quote.Message: The more faithfully you listen to the voices within you, the better you will hear what is sounding outside.

Quote.Author: U Thant
Quote.Message: Wars begin in the minds of men, and in those minds love and compassion would have built the defences of peace.

Quote.Author: Kofi Annan
Quote.Message: More than ever before in human history, we share a common destiny. We can master it only if we face it together. And that, my friends, is why we have the United Nations.

Quote.Author: Ban Ki-Moon
Quote.Message: Together we want to help the world see and believe in a better future.

Quote.Author: Trygve Lie
Quote.Message: I shall take all the troubles of the past, all the disappointments, all the headaches, and I shall pack them in a bag and throw them in the East River.
